promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic rare deer fire-type wearing a white crystal headband. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Blazebuck, a gigantic rare deer fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: flare-blitz, recover. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word deer or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, deer-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Blazebuck roams the fiery realm. Calm by day, pyrotechnic at night, no match for its blazing moves!
